content.question: Which of the following most directly resulted from concerns over the increased power of the federal government in the late 1700s?

choices.label: Rebellions over the right to tax goods, such as the Whiskey Rebellion
Slave uprisings, such as Nat Turner’s Rebellion
Revolts over requirements to pay taxes in hard currency, such as Shays’ Rebellion
Conflicts over access to land, such as Bacon’s Rebellion

content.answer: Rebellions over the right to tax goods, such as the Whiskey Rebellion

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
